Text: Thanks for another killer sharing learning set, I'm working on getting a seedbox to help out in the sharing!, some of use really are thankful dude!, thanks again!...

Its great what you're doing here...

But for a beginner who's got no idea how to take these tutorials in a step by step manner,what about them? how would they download?

For ex "lynda's one on one" has atleast 3 volumes but there's no categorizing in your torrent. Like - "lynda one on one Vol 1 ..." "lynda one on one Vol 2..." & so on. Cos people like me who are unaware of these thing have no clue which one should we first download.These are all zipped file afterall.

Similarly if a set has many volumes to it pls name it serially so that we can track it properly. Frankly I'm lost looking at these marvelous uploads of yours. Cos I don't know which one should I download first.

That doesn't take away my regards to your fine uploads. The best in pirate bay but even the best can improve. Pls don't take this in a wrong way. Its like I've found a treasure but I don't understand the currency.

My respects...
Perfect! My humble thanks to uploader!

To All Of My Awesome Supporters
---------------------------------------
At the end of this week I am stepping down from the gordsmash title and giving it to my pal. I want to thank everyone for supporting gordsmash and uploading my torrents to keep them alive! I hoped that everyone of you has enjoyed my torrents! I want to thank all of you for supporting me! Thank you all and goodbye!
Thanks! I really needed something like this...a visual hands-holding instruction on XML.
Could you please upload Lynda Up and Running with VBA in Excel ? Thanks!
